text:
@realDonaldTrump COVID19 DEATHS ON YOUR WATCH 105,746

And here you are on twitter doing nothing but causing more DIVISION in our country!

The World knows you are an INEPT person because you simply can not be called a leader.

LEADERS DON'T LET THEIR PEOPLE DIE NEEDLESSLY
